title: Network discovery: lodestar failed to dial a lot of peers at the same time
body: **Describe the bug** Found this on a mainnet nodes running v1.2.1, lodestar dials same peer at the same time ``` beacon-2022-11-21.log:366296:Nov-21 10:24:11.752[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises were rejecte beacon-2022-11-21.log:366298:Nov-21 10:24:11.752[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises were reject beacon-2022-11-21.log:366300:Nov-21 10:24:11.752[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises were rejec beacon-2022-11-21.log:366302:Nov-21 10:24:11.752[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises were reje beacon-2022-11-21.log:366304:Nov-21 10:24:11.752[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises were rej beacon-2022-11-21.log:366306:Nov-21 10:24:11.752[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises were re beacon-2022-11-21.log:366308:Nov-21 10:24:11.752[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises were r beacon-2022-11-21.log:366310:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises were beacon-2022-11-21.log:366312:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises wer beacon-2022-11-21.log:366314:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises we beacon-2022-11-21.log:366316:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises w beacon-2022-11-21.log:366318:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promises beacon-2022-11-21.log:366320:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promise beacon-2022-11-21.log:366322:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promis beacon-2022-11-21.log:366324:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All promi beacon-2022-11-21.log:366326:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All prom beacon-2022-11-21.log:366328:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All pro beacon-2022-11-21.log:366330:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All pr beacon-2022-11-21.log:366332:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All p beacon-2022-11-21.log:366334:Nov-21 10:24:11.753[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...WSFRXL All ``` it also dials different peers ``` beacon-2022-11-21.log:365402:Nov-21 10:23:50.407[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...LaRaTu All promises were rejecte beacon-2022-11-21.log:365420:Nov-21 10:23:50.823[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...XJKdXg All promises were rejecte beacon-2022-11-21.log:365516:Nov-21 10:23:51.128[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...SySh89 All promises were rejecte beacon-2022-11-21.log:365550:Nov-21 10:23:51.427[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...XJKdXg All promises were rejecte beacon-2022-11-21.log:365552:Nov-21 10:23:51.427[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...XJKdXg All promises were reject beacon-2022-11-21.log:365689:Nov-21 10:23:55.143[network] debug: Error dialing discovered peer peer=16...SySh89 All promises were rejecte ``` this was found when investigating #4661 when we receive a lot of goodbye requests this error happens a lot **Expected behavior** Lodestar should not keeps dialing same peer at the same time
